sentence.Network_en: His relentless aggression bludgeons you into seeing his point.
sentence.Network_cn: 他咄咄逼人地强迫你了解他的看法。

sentence.Network_en: The song is a fiery mix of twanging guitar with relentless drumming.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一首夹杂着撩拨的吉他声和密集的鼓点的激情四射的歌曲。

sentence.Network_en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... laudatory 表示赞美的，褒扬的 relentless 无情的 lethal 致命的（忘了，死了）.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... sapless 没有无气的 relentless 无情的，残酷的 dauntless 勇敢的，无畏的.
新东方|英语六级绝密资料 - 豆丁网 ... turbulent 混乱的，动荡的＝ relentless 无情，冷酷 kennel 有.
新东方英语四级词汇30天学习笔记（3） - 豆丁网 ... relent 发仁慈、慈善的 relentless 冷酷无情的 care 关心.

list.abs: 后悔英语怎么读_百度知道 ... repent and reform: 忏悔 relentless hells 无间地狱 * retreat 闭关 *.
The result is a relentless legal attack on branded drugs ., 最终结果是对知名药物无情的法律攻击.
constancy nor relentless change will support a creation ., 恒久不变和无情的变化都无益创造.
Perhaps the most relentless enemy of achievement or personal growth or success is inflexibility ., 一个人寻求成就 , 成长 , 成功所面临最无情的敌人可能是欠缺酌情变通的能力.

entry.tran: 不停的;不懈的;不间断的；未减轻的
entry.def: Something bad that is relentless never stops or never becomes less intense.
Someone who is relentless is determined to do something and refuses to give up, even if what they are doing is unpleasant or cruel.

example.ex: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable...
example.tran: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

example.ex: He was the most relentless enemy I have ever known.
example.tran: 他是我所遇到的最不屈不挠的敌手。

means.word_mean: 1. not to be placated or appeased or moved by entreaty;

sentences.sentence: "Russia's final hour, it seemed, approached with inexorable certainty"

auth_sentence.content: The relentless pursuit of being different is very French.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rest休息,静止+less无……的,不……的→adj.得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sense感觉+less无……的,不……的→adj.不省人事的,无感觉的,无意识的
spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的

Sentence.sentence: The novelist Edward St Aubyn has a narrator remark of the very rich that, "not having to consider affordability, their desires rambled on like unstoppable bores, relentless (持续不断的) and whimsical（反复无常的）at the same time.

means.word_mean: 残酷的, 不留情的, 无怜悯心的

sentences.cn: 交通车辆的噪音一刻也不停止。

jushi.english: I know him to be nothing but a man of pleasure, a dandy who has given himself up to the relentless pursuit of sensual pleasure.
jushi.chinese: 我知道他是一个放荡的人,一个不顾一切、死心塌地地追求情欲之欢的花花公子。
